Field module¶

Field handles field discretization and validation. - generate grid discretization. - check legal conditions of given locations. - check collision with obstacles.

class Field.Field¶

Bases: object

Field handles everything with regarding to the field element.

border_contains(loc: ndarray) → bool¶

Test if point is within the border polygon
